entry.title: Greek PM: I empowered experts to fight Covid-19

media:group.media:title: Greek PM: I empowered experts to fight Covid-19
media:group.media:description: Everyone is fighting Covid-19 "their own way," Kyriakos Mitsotakis tells Nic Robertson in an exclusive interview. "Until now, I think we've done it the right way." #CNN #News

media:group.media:title: How coronavirus masks became political
media:group.media:description:
The CDC recommends people wear masks in public to combat coronavirus, but when VP Mike Pence visited a hospital without a mask, it showcased a growing political divide. Chris Cillizza explains.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: Trump announces new face mask recommendations after heated internal debate https://edition.cnn.com/2020/04/03/politics/trump-white-house-face-masks/index.html
Pence flouts Mayo Clinic policy on masks -- which is to wear one https://www.cnn.com/2020/04/28/politics/mike-pence-mayo-clinic-mask/index.html
Pence says he should have worn a mask at the Mayo Clinic https://edition.cnn.com/2020/05/03/politics/mike-pence-mayo-clinic/index.html
Gov. DeWine: My face mask order went ‘too far’ https://www.politico.com/news/2020/05/03/dewine-ohio-face-masks-coronavirus-231175
Use of Cloth Face Coverings to Help Slow the Spread of COVID-19 https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prevent-getting-sick/diy-cloth-face-coverings.html
3 charged in killing of store security guard over virus mask https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/police-probe-killing-of-store-security-guard-over-virus-mask/2020/05/04/8c5a01de-8e23-11ea-9322-a29e75effc93_story.html
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Michelle Cho Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/cnn/dvgb325pfm
#CNN #Cillizza #CoronavirusMasks

entry.title: President Donald Trump downplays models projecting Covid-19 death increases

media:group.media:title: President Donald Trump downplays models projecting Covid-19 death increases
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump spoke to reporters as he departed the White House about recent projection models from Johns Hopkins University and IHME that show an increase in deaths from Covid-19 in the US. CNN's Jeremy Diamond reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: How climate change impacted the world in 2019

media:group.media:title: How climate change impacted the world in 2019
media:group.media:description:
Rising sea levels, devastating disasters, fires burning at record rates, and threats of food shortage -- as 2019 marks the end of the hottest decade on record, CNN recaps some of the catastrophic effects of climate change this year across the globe
#ClimateChange #CNN #News

entry.title: The story behind Princess Leia's 'Star Wars' hairstyle

media:group.media:title: The story behind Princess Leia's 'Star Wars' hairstyle
media:group.media:description:
Carrie Fisher wasn't originally a fan of her hair buns in ​"Star Wars: A New Hope," but -- despite not featuring in the following Star Wars films -- the look has become a signature of the rebel princess.
#StarWars #MaytheFourth #CNN

entry.title: CDC projects 3,000 Americans will die daily from coronavirus in June

media:group.media:title: CDC projects 3,000 Americans will die daily from coronavirus in June
media:group.media:description:
Internal Trump administration projections estimate that about 3,000 Americans will die from the coronavirus every day by June 1, according to CDC documents obtained by the New York Times.
The increased estimates come as states have eased restrictions and after a weekend many Americans spent outside at protests or enjoying spring days in the park. Florida, Colorado, Indiana, Nebraska, South Carolina and West Virginia, among others, moved to loosen restrictions in an attempt to revive a sputtering economy and calm restless residents.
But the projections make clear that these reopenings come with fatal risks. #CNN #News #politics #usnews #presidentdonaldtrump

entry.title: Don Lemon to Trump: What is it about Obama that gets under your skin?

media:group.media:title: Don Lemon to Trump: What is it about Obama that gets under your skin?
media:group.media:description: CNN's Don Lemon slammed President Donald Trump's response to a unifying message from former president George W. Bush amidst the coronavirus pandemic and questioned Trump's frequent attacks on former president Barack Obama. #CNN #News #politics #presidentdonaldtrump #usnews #cnntonightwithdonlemon

entry.title: Listen to George W. Bush's message about Covid-19

media:group.media:title: Listen to George W. Bush's message about Covid-19
media:group.media:description: Former President George W. Bush called for an end to partisanship in the nation's continued battle against the coronavirus, urging Americans to "remember that empathy and simple kindness are essential powerful tools of national recovery." #CNN #News #politics #usnews #presidentdonaldtrump
